flawed_nl_solution:
After 10 years, growing at the rate of 3 inches every year, Haley will have grown by 3*10 = <<3*10=30>>30 inches.
If she is currently 20 inches tall, her height after 10 years will be 20+30 = <<20+30=60>>60 inches.
#### 60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 60. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
